thread.title: Live: President Donald Trump names his choice of Supreme Court justice
thread.title_full: Live: President Donald Trump names his choice of Supreme Court justice

author: Telegraph Video
title: Live: President Donald Trump names his choice of Supreme Court justice
text:
Live: President Donald Trump names his choice of Supreme Court justice Watch | Live: President Donald Trump names his choice of Supreme Court justice Live Telegraph Video , video source APTN  57am 
P resident Donald Trump reveals his choice to fill the vacant seat on the Supreme Court setting the tone for interpretations of the constitution for years to come. 
The judge will have a lifetime appointment, if confirmed, will play a key role as the court considers abortion access, gay and transgender rights and legal challenges to key aspects of Mr Trumpâ€™s agenda. 
President Trump's candidate could end up having a profound affect US domestic direction, so is almost certain to face bitter opposition from the Democrats.
